context.p: Use command BMEXPLODE to create an exploded representation of the current assembly.You must have at least one insert of a part in the assembly for the command to work.

step.cmd: Choose one of the following actions to launch command BMEXPLODE:

ul.li: Click the Explode tool button on the Tools panel of the Assembly tab.
Click the Explode tool button on the Assembly toolbar.
Select Explode in the Assembly menu.
Type bmexplode in the command bar.

step.stepresult: You are prompted: Select explosion algorithm [Table by types/Linear/Manual/Settings]:

step.cmd: If applicable, set the Level and the Name of the exploded representation using the Settings option.

step.stepresult: You are prompted: Select exploded view behavior [Edit/Generate drawing views/Finish]:

step.cmd: Perform one of the following actions:

ul.li: Select Edit to edit the exploded representation.
Select Generate drawing views to generate drawing views of the exploded representation.
Select Finish to finish the command.
